title: T205 Available for Sale - REDUCED - SOLD
author: Eggoman

posts.post_title: T205 Available for Sale - REDUCED - SOLD
posts.post_content:
ALL CARDS HAVE BEEN SOLD - THANK YOU ALL!

Apparently, my prices are too high!  Ok, these will be the only price reductions before they go to auction.  THANKS FOR LOOKING - AGAIN!


Hello All!

I have just upgraded some T205s from my set so I am making these available – freshly back from SGC!

[STRIKE]BARGER “B” on cap – Piedmont 25 – SGC 40 –   [/STRIKE] - $80.00 - SOLD

[strike]CADY – Hassan 649 – SGC 30 – $50[/STRIKE] - $42.00 - SOLD

[STRIKE]LEE – Hassan 649 – SGC 40 – $95[/STRIKE] - $80.00 - SOLD

[strike]McALLISTER – Hassan 649 – SGC 20 – $45[/STRIKE] - $35.00 - SOLD

[strike]PASKERT – Sovereign 25 – SGC 40 – $45[/STRIKE] - $35.00 - SOLD

[strike]RUCKER – Piedmont 25 – SGC 10 – $35[/STRIKE] - $24.00 - SOLD

Please message me if you are interested.  I will sell these cards in the order that I receive your requests. "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.”  (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

(All prices are “Net to Me” and include shipping.)

PayPal – Friends or Family is preferred OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!

Thank you for your consideration!
New prices - good luck & thanks for looking - again!
The sale of Wyatt Lee fell through.  He is available again.
